description.@en: Drawing from the Abyss, you grant a black blessing in exchange for part of the recipientâ€™s soul.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, the person you touch can add +5% to Combat, Fellowship and Willpower-related Skills. However, once the Duration of the spell has expired, they suffer 3 Corruption.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but they gain a +10% instead.

criticalFailure.@en: You have displeased whatever demon would have granted such chaotic power. As a consequence, the intended beneficiary to this Magick instead suffers from His Dark Punishment. The person you touch suffers a -10% to Combat, Fellowship and Willpower-related Skills for the Duration of the spell. In addition, they suffer 3 Corruption once the Duration ends.

reagents.@en: An appropriate sacrifice, such as a small kitten (expended)

system.distance: Any one person you can touch
